name: Dungeon Master (itch) (JPuertovannetti, es-arvind13, Cadentt)
description:
It is time to show off your dungeon skills! 

Dungeon Master is a game where you find yourself trapped inside a dungeon with monsters lurking around! 
Kill them all to retrieve the key and escape the dungeon before the timer runs out or you will be trapped in this maze forever!

Features

  • Classic dungeon action!
    • Make your way inside this dungeon maze!
  • Monsters mayhem
    • Monsters spawn in different areas of the dungeon, it is your mission to find and kill them all before time runs out!
  • Key to freedom
    • A chest will appear containing a key that you need to grab once you kill all enemies, it is your mission to find the exit to your freedom!

Controls

Credits - Team Dungeon Loverz
